title: Borderlands.2.Update.1-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W
.the leading force.

proudly presents
Tony Hawks Pro Skater HD Update 1

23-09-2012......Release Date <-> Protection.............Steam+CEG
FPS/RPG............Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!

INSTALL NOTES

1. Run Borderlands.2.Update.1.exe
2. Install
3. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder to the main install
folder and overwrite
4. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
5. Play the game
6. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

ADDITIONAL NOTES

Use B2Launcher.exe, included with the cracked content, for setting the
language of your choice.

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
